name: MSME Loan Guarantee Scheme
description: Credit guarantee scheme for micro and small enterprises to provide collateral-free loans
benefits: Collateral-free loans up to ₹2 crore, Lower interest rates, Government guarantee coverage

name: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
description: Financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market entry, and commercialization
benefits: Seed funding up to ₹50 lakhs, Mentorship support, Tax benefits under Section 80-IAC
source: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT)

name: Credit Linked Capital Subsidy Scheme (CLCSS)
description: Technology upgradation support for MSMEs with capital subsidy on institutional finance
benefits: 15% capital subsidy on institutional finance up to ₹1 crore, Technology upgradation support

name: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Credit linked subsidy programme for setting up new micro-enterprises
benefits: Subsidy of 15-35% on project cost, Working capital support, Training assistance

name: Stand-Up India Scheme
description: Facilitating bank loans for setting up greenfield enterprises in manufacturing, services or trading sector
benefits: Loans between ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore, Lower interest rates, Handholding support

name: Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (TUFS)
description: Support for technology upgradation in textile and jute industries
benefits: 5% interest reimbursement, 15% capital subsidy for specified machinery, Flexible repayment terms

name: National Small Industries Corporation (NSIC) Subsidy
description: Various schemes for marketing support, technology support, and credit facilitation
benefits: Marketing support, Credit rating fee subsidy, ISO certification subsidy, Technology support

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Provides loans to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises
benefits: Loans up to ₹10 lakh (Shishu: ₹50K, Kishore: ₹5L, Tarun: ₹10L), No collateral required

name: Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)
description: Provides guarantees for loans extended to MSMEs without collateral
benefits: Collateral-free credit up to ₹2 crore, 85% guarantee coverage, Composite loan facility

name: Make in India Initiative
description: Facilitating investment, fostering innovation, enhancing skill development, protecting intellectual property
benefits: Tax incentives, Ease of doing business, Infrastructure development support
source: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

name: Atal Innovation Mission (AIM)
description: Government's flagship initiative to promote innovation and entrepreneurship
benefits: Grant support up to ₹2.5 crore, Mentorship, Incubation support, Access to innovation labs

name: Digital India Programme
description: Support for digital transformation of businesses and infrastructure
benefits: Digital infrastructure support, Skills development, Tax benefits for digital startups
